title: Ep. 178 - Pence's Wife Attacked For Job At Christian School
description:
Mike Pence’s wife, Karen, is the target of outrage today because she got a job at a Christian school. The media claims the school is"anti-LGBT." Why? Because it affirms Christian teaching on sexual morality. Also, is it ever really necessary to apologize for an opinion? I say no. Finally, Kamala Harris shared some deep thoughts with the world. They just might change your life. Date: 01-17-2019
